Our Journey

A timeline

  • 01.09.2024

    Our Humble Beginning

    Three siblings, three unique strengths, one vision. On this day, we took the first step toward securing a future investment - combining our talents to purchase a property that will grow in value and opportunity over time.

  • 04.03.2025

    First Bank Meeting

    A major milestone on our journey - our first meeting with the bank. Discussing financing options, understanding mortgage possibilities, and taking the next steps toward securing our investment property.
